= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *ABA.EAR* || Ear || Transfer audio waves mechanically to cochlea || Includes outer ear, medial ear ||
|| *ABA.COCHLEA* || Cochlea || Tonotopic mapping || Contains outer (OHC) and inner (IHC) hair cells in the cochlea, inner ear ||
|| *ABA.CN* || Cochlea Nucleus || Divergence in representation of auditory information || ||
|| *ABA.SOC* || Superior Olivary Complex || Bilateral Audition || Projections from both left and right ABA.CN ||
|| *ABA.IC* || Inferior Colliculus || Reflex centres of hearing || ||
|| *ABA.TH.MGB* || Medial Geniculate Body || Detection of the relative intensity and duration of a sound, relay to Auditory Cortex || Thalamus ||
|| - || Olivo-Cochlear Bundle || Control working point and effectiveness of ABA.COCHLEA || Projections from ABA.SOC ||
